From custom homes to potlight installations and everything in between such as panels and service upgrades, Hotwire Electric-All can meet your electrical needs. We have build our reputation on quality workmanship and impeccable customer service. Coupled with personalized electrical design and advise to suit each individual client. At Hotwire Electric, our certified electricians are 110% committed to serving our clients with great service, honesty, and most important integrity. We offer a full spectrum of services for residential homes and commerical sites, from small projects to large. We strive to be efficient, neat and organized. We ensure our customers’ satisfaction from beginning to end. From basic electrical wiring to high-end lighting design, home automation and million dollar custom homes we insist on paying attention to detail and providing superior workmanship every step of the way. For us, no job is too big or too small Contact us for a quote today and see the Hotwire difference in your project! We offer our residential and commercial services 7 days a week. Contact us for your free estimate on your electrical projects. Hotwire Electric-All in is a fully insured and an authorized electrical contractor with the Electrical Safety Authority. profile:
Harris Plumbing's Mission:  "To serve our communities with passion, integrity, and expertise, consistently exceeding expectations and providing peace of mind for all your plumbing needs."                                                    

Proudly providing world-class client services and a full suite of high quality plumbing products and services to residences, businesses and industry in Newmarket and York Region, Barrie and Simcoe County and Muskoka, Harris Plumbing is family owned since 1974.

We invite you to experience the Harris Plumbing difference. Our world-class customer service team and our highly skilled, continuously-trained technical staff all work to our standards, policies and procedures that we have built over our almost 50 years in business. 

At Harris Plumbing Inc. we offer a complete suite of high quality, professional residential, cottage and commercial plumbing services that really raise the bar in Newmarket, Aurora, Barrie, Muskoka and everywhere in between.  We are 100% focused on Quality Workmanship & Customer Satisfaction. Our customers are extremely loyal and delighted with our VIP-style service. 

Water softeners, water conditioning, iron and sulphur removal - high quality equipment made right here in Ontario, tank-less hot water plus hot water tanks, drain clearing and camera inspection service, main sewer drain replacement - both excavation and "trenchless".  Fixture upgrades like toilets, showers, bathtubs, etc. We are a fully licensed Well Contractor and Backflow Prevention Certified.

Steve Harris, a talented Master Plumber and entrepreneur, is firmly at the helm of this exceptional organization. Steve began his plumbing career in 1978 as an apprentice with his father and Master Plumber Ray Harris in York Region.  Ray believed in old-fashioned hard work and perfection on the job. He demanded nothing but the best from Steve and taught him to accept nothing less from himself.

Since 2002 and under Steve's leadership and guidance, Harris Plumbing has grown to encompass a much larger geography to serve more clients, and offers a huge array of quality plumbing services to home owners and business owners who want to feel completely comfortable with the service they receive - from their first call to our amazing Client Service Advisors, to the friendly, uniformed and efficient service appointment by our plumbers, to our follow-up phone call to ensure complete client satisfaction. 

Our entire multi-award-winning team is continuously trained in the latest high quality products and services, equipped with high technology equipment and tools and brings a friendly, honest and trustworthy climate to this esteemed trade. 

Our reputation for excellence is a reflection of our professionalism, hard work and commitment.

* Your call is always answered by a real person - any day or night even on holidays. 
* Our expert technicians are hand-picked, highly trained, uniformed & in fully stocked, reliable trucks.  
* Well Pumps - we are a certified well contractor. We do not drill them but we do service them.
* Backflow Prevention - we provide municipality-approved backflow testing, installation & surveys
* Water Quality Professionals - trust your family's water supply to a licensed, professional journeyman plumber. They alone are qualified to access your potable water system.. by law. Softeners, iron filters, chlorine removal, UV, Ozone, Reverse Osmosis, etc.
* Cottage Specialists - seasonal water systems are more complicated. Openings, closings, all pumps, upgrades, repiping, winter water - We know cottages!
* Sewer main replacements & repairs - we offer "trenchless" methods for repairs plus full excavations when necessary.

Like most high quality, reliable plumbing contractors we have abandoned time/material/hourly fees and adopted "Up-Front Pricing". After a thorough diagnostic of your situation by our plumbers, we then offer you our professional recommendations with any available options, and pricing up-front so you can make your decision based on actual numbers and facts. We are prepared to proceed with your job immediately or at your convenience.

After-hours emergency services are available throughout north York Region and Simcoe County. Professional, reliable services by our own licensed, local and insured craftsmen, we take pride in our work and will always respect your home, cottage and property. 
Please note that during COVID-19 our 24/7 emergency services will be offered to our "Harris Home Advantage Plan" members only to keep our staff and our clients safe.

Ask us about our "Harris Home Advantage Plan" - your opportunity to enjoy a limited membership VIP service club offered only to forward-thinking homeowners like you who really love your home and don't have time for unexpected plumbing breakdowns and devastating water damage!  See all the details at www.harrisplumbing.ca/about/harris-home-advantage-plan-hhap/ or give us a call today. So many benefits...


Cottage services: water treatment systems, renovations, upgrades, pump upgrades repair & replacement, septic treatments, complete or partial re-piping.
Expert drain cleaning and clearing, repairs and complete main drain replacements.

We are truly "The Plumbers YOU Can Count On!" and we look forward to meeting you!
Call us today to arrange for your quote or service appointment. We're in your neighbourhood.  

York Region:
Newmarket     905-853-8520
Aurora        905-841-9211

Simcoe County:
Barrie        705-730-7950
Orillia       705-327-6540
Muskoka       705-762-3811
Huntsville    705-789-5578
service_area: Family owned and operated and proudly serving all of York Region and Simcoe County / Muskoka since 1974. With offices in Newmarket, Barrie and Huntsville, our highly skilled, professional technicians are radio dispatched by our Client Care Coordinators to residences and businesses quickly and efficiently 24/7.
products:
Offering 24/7 emergency service, we bring a complete suite of professional plumbing services for your home, cottage and business.  We use only high quality products with the best warranties. Our workmanship is perfection and we guarantee everything we do for you. 
Water treatment - Novo high quality softeners, UV, RO and all types of filtration systems. Navien tankless hot water systems and hot water tank replacement. Quality fixtures + faucets replacements, outside drain cleaning, repairs and replacements.  Expert repairs inside and outside your home, office or cottage.
services:
Water treatment products including softeners, chlorine, iron, sulphur removal and custom solutions. 
Drain clearing and camera inspection service, main drain and water line replacement/excavations. Bathroom, kitchen and laundry room upgrades.
Pumps of all kinds - well, jet, submersible, sump, sewage.
Cottage services: water treatment systems, renovations, upgrades, jet & submersible pump upgrades, repair & replacement, septic treatments, complete or partial re-piping.
Expert drain cleaning and clearing, repairs and complete main drain replacements.
brands: We use only high quality brands with the best warranties. Toto, Grohe, Kohler, Moen, Novo, Navien, Bradford White, Maax, Mirolin, Lukx, Judo, Franke Kindred, Insinkerator, Myers, Hydromatic, BioSmart just to name a few
specialities: We pride ourselves on our efficient customer service and quality workmanship - right from your original call to our Client Care Coordinators, to the talented, highly trained technicians, to the birthday card for your hot water tank!  As Harris Plumbing, we are.. The Plumbers YOU Can Count On! and we will work very hard to earn - and keep - your business.

profile:
During the past twenty years we are proud to be known as the most dependable, innovative and skilled contractors in the industry. 
We have a wide range of experience and expertise in Residential, Retail and Commercial accounts. 
This comes as a result of the structured focus of our team in building lasting and beneficial relationships with our clients. 
We invite you to browse through our website. Should there be any interest in receiving an estimate, do not hesitate to contact us.

Quality Assurance isn't just our name it's also one of our highest achievable priorities that we stand by. 
Successful control over our contracts has always been an important part of our philosophy. 
Our approach to maintaining high standards of workmanship and to assure customer satisfaction, our customer retention rate is a key factor to our business successes. 
Quality controls are maintained by doing regular quality check points with our clients.

We start with a detailed analysis of each contract, collecting all pertinent data needed for the preparation of a realistic service 
proposal. Our knowledge of the assessed account enables us to prepare both Scheduling and Quality Assurance.

Give A Call - 905-955-5248
